events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago but it still hasn't arrived, the shipping seems very delayed and I haven't received any tracking updates.
The customer's issue regarding a late order shipment has been identified as a delivery delay problem.
The case has been assigned to the delivery support team to investigate the delayed shipment.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry to hear about your delayed order, and I'll do my best to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and the date you placed the order so I can track the shipment for you?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I placed it on May 25th. I really need it soon as it was intended as a gift.
I've checked with our shipping partner and it appears there is an unexpected delay in transit. We can offer expedited shipping at no extra cost or a full refund if you prefer.
Thank you for the update. I would appreciate expedited shipping to receive the order as quickly as possible.
Your order has been upgraded to expedited shipping and we expect it to arrive within 3 business days. You'll receive tracking updates shortly.
We are following up to confirm that your order was received and to ensure you are satisfied with the resolution provided.
Since we have not heard back from you, we are closing this support case. Please reach out if you need any further assistance.
